translation: O Bharata, all beings are subject to delusion at birth due to the delusion of the pairs of opposites arising from desire and aversion, O Parantapa.
commentary: 7.27 arisen from desire and aversion? by the delusion of the pairs of opposites? India Or Bharata? Sarvabhutani all beings? Sammoham to delusion? Serge at birth? Yanti are subject? Parantapa O Parantapa (scorcher of the foes).Commentary Where there is pleasure there is Raga or attachment where there is pain there is Dvesha or aversion. There is the instinct in man to preserve
